tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I consulted her for a hysterectomy because fibroids was causing excessive heavy bleeding that left me severely anemic and affected my lifestyle very badly. She counseled me very well before the surgery explaining the process options and risks. She gave me the confidence to go ahead with the surgery. She and her excellent surgical team did a fantastic job and the post recovery was so smooth that it surprised me. I could walk in a few hours after surgery and went home after 48 hours. She told me what to follow after surgery and was very confident and explained everything in details which helps to take decisions and set expectations. Highly recommend her for any gynecology issue. I trust her and the team at Sakra to do an excellent job and the best care in Bangalore.
reply_text: Thank you for taking the time to write this review. Your kind words and appreciation mean a lot to us at Sakra, and we'll be sure to convey your message to Dr. Shanthala Thuppanna We wish you the best of health in the future!

tags: None
review: Dr. Shanthala is a life saviour. I have very rarely come across a doctor who is so patient, calm, friendly and most importantly so good at what she does. She is one of the very few Laparoscopic surgeons available in Bangalore, maybe India. She knows her job. Talks to the point and is genuinely a very -very good doctor. She saved my 77 year old grandmother from a fibroid/tumor. Almost no doctor wanted to perform a hysterectomy on a geriatric patient, but she was confident from day 1. The way she handles her patient and visitors, the way she explains things, has a human touch. All women suffering from related issues must make a visit to her.

tags: None
review:
I had a very bad experience, an emergency situation of excessive blood loss in urine, severe abdominal pain and tiredness. Doctor prescribed a Urinary routine test and Culture stimulation(result would take 3 days) and very basic medicines. Symptoms were concluded as UTI, ***** medicines for 3 days and no emergency steps were taken. 
As I was unsatisfied, visited another hospital. **** *** ******** *** ***** ** ***** ******* ********** *********** *** ********* ***** **** ****** 
I am extremely disappointed **** ***** ********** ***** ********* *** ***** ******** *******

tags: None
review:
First, they ask you to pay Rs 100 separately for registration charges for just giving a blank file on which they write your name. This extra charge was no where mentioned at the time of appointment booking on Practo. 

Second, they made it mandatory to wear masks or buy one stating it as a local law while the doctor herself during speaking, had her mask down. This is absolutely unwarranted.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am writing to Thank Dr. Shantala Thuppanna for her excellent diagnosis, approach and friendliness with which she explained the issue and the solution that she gave which gave relief, satisfaction and kind of confidence. We were confused and worried with the suggestions given by other doctors. But its Dr. Shantala Thuppanna who understood the situation and did the right thing to treat the condition considering the all the factors.

It‚Äôs not just the treatment, but the care and responsiveness shown by doctors like Dr. Shantala makes the difference.
reply_text: Thank you

tags: None
review: I was diagnosed for fibroids and was suggested to get it operated. We got to know about Dr Shanthala through my sister's friend, in the very first visit doctor gave me a whole picture of what the surgery was all about, expense,insurance coverage,stay in the hospital, post surgery care. This made me feel well prepared for the surgery. We decided to get it operated in few weeks time and its been a month now and Im glad I went to Dr Shantala, everything went very smooth and her team made me feel very comfortable. Along with the good experience she had  the way she took me through the whole process was amazing. Thank you once again for taking care of me so well.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I was suffering from Endometriosis for the past two years. I was taking medications to relieve my symptoms and avoid surgery. Things were going fine until recently when my doctor told me that my endometriosis has increased in size and advised me to go for a total hysterectomy through an open surgery. She completely ruled out the option of laparoscopy. Since it was a complex surgery, we decided to go for a second opinion. After reading positive reviews about Dr. Shanthala Thuppanna, we approached her at Sakra World Hospital.  She was confident that the surgery could be performed laparoscopically and only in a complex scenario would she do an open surgery. She answered all my queries patiently and we decided to go with her. Her coordinator ensured the entire process from hospitalisation to discharge was smooth.  My surgery (Total hysterectomy + Bilateral Salpingo Oopherectomy) was done laparoscopically which made me little relaxed and my post surgery issues were also very well taken care of by her dedicated team of doctors and nurses before I was discharged. The hospital staff was also very cooperative and helpful.
 I am extremely thankful to Dr Shanthala Thuppanna and her team for my treatment and would highly recommend her for her expertise and genuineness.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Hello All,
My mother T.Sujatha 54years  has been facing uterus prolapse issue from past 5 years and she is a heart patient too.We tried so many options like pesaries from so many doctors but nothing was useful.
At last we met Dr.Shantala Tuppanna from sakra world Hospitals bellandhur location we are very happy for her way of treating patient and her friendliness later she explained every thing regarding procedure( Laparoscopic Sacrocolpopexy With Mesh).
First of all we feared bcoz my mother is a heart patient but doctor told us not to worry . We kept faith on her and proceeded for surgery . Surgery went on well and in between she contacted cardiologist,radiologist .we stayed in hospital for 3 days.Lastly i have to thank Dr.Shantala mam's  assistant Dr.Uma Maheshwari which she helped us very lot regarding medications etc.
Seriously believe me my mother is not facing any pain and she is very happy so we too.
We are very thankful to Dr.Shantala Tuppanna.*** ****** **** *** ***** ********* **** ********* ****** ******* ** ***********
reply_text: Thank you for taking the time to write this review. Your kind words and appreciation mean a lot to us at Sakra, and we'll be sure to convey your message to Dr.Shanthala Thuppanna   We wish you the best of health in the future

review: *** ********** *** **** ******** ******* Not at all friendly. She isn't even maintaining the basics of hiegene and will you see her scratching her head and then holding the pills with the same hand.But she would make sure to make you sit 5ft away and explain the procedure. God knows what she writes on the prescription, hard to understand from 5ft apart. There is something called empathy. She lacks it totally.

very patiently answered all our queries. A no fuss kind of doctor, always ready to answer our queries at any time. The surgery was a success and I have had minimal post op pain. **** ******** *** organised, I would strongly recommend my doctor to one and all.

tags: None
review: I consulted Dr. Shanthala after a couple of doctors recommended abdominal hysterectomy for me citing that the fibroid was quite big. Being a Laparoscopic Surgeon, Dr. Shanthala appeared very confident about doing it laparoscopically. While others suggested hormone injections to bring down the size of the uterus, Dr. Shanthala did not suggest anything of that sort. She spent considerable amount of time during my OP visits to explain the treatment options and why those do not suit me. Things were smooth during surgery and post-surgery. Dr. Shanthala has been available to clarify my questions during the recovery period. Because of Dr. Shanthala, I could avoid doing abdominal hysterectomy when laparoscopic hysterectomy was very much a possibility.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
In my experience the doctor was very curt, unfriendly, impatient and rude . I requested her to give few min for me to breathe/relax before the pap smear test as I was doing it after a long time. Instead of giving me the time , she forced the test before I was ready , was talking very loudly and said that i need to hurry up with the test as she has more patients to see. This shows that she had absolutely no empathy nor patience. The main quality that is needed for a doctor that too a Gynaecologist is to put the patient at ease , give comfort & confidence. Not cause extreme pain, tension & stress. 

Consultation Fees also is exorbitantly high. When you are charging so much. at-least try to connect with the patient and respect what they are feeling/ going through too. *** *** ******** ****** *** ******* Can be more sensitive next time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,

I have heavy bleeding.. She even didn't see my face and my reports ... Simply she wrote some tablets and asked me to use for 21 days.. So we r not at happy.. We r going for second ...opinion.** ****** ****** ***** ********* **** **** ** *********** **** * *** ****** **** * ******* **** **** ************* ***** ** * *** * ******* ********* *** *** ** ******* ************

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: When we were told that we would have to go thorough the Total Laparoscopy Hysterectomy procedure, we were very apprehensive about all of it. At that time we came to know of Dr Shanthala and our first meeting with her was so good that we immediately decided to proceed with the procedure with her and we must say that the way she treated us was amazing. The surgery and post operative experience was excellent. We are very happy to have as our Doctor and would recommend her to anyone who is looking for a profession and caring doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Met Dr. Shanthala Thuppanna for treatment of uterine fibroids. Doctor is extremely patient. She answered my many questions and concerns calmly. She said, in my case, a total laparoscopic hysterectomy needed to be performed and explained the process well. It has been a week since my surgery. My surgery was successful and without any complications.  Recovery has been great. I am extremely satisfied with the doctor and highly recommend her to all patients who may be having this condition. **** ******* ************ ******* *** ************** I would like to convey my sincere thanks to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: We visited Dr.Shanthala for my sister Fibroids uterus at Asia Columbia, Sarjapur Road. We were very happy with her thorough diagnosis. She gave a very good time, explained and clear all our doubts. After meeting the Doctor, my sister who was married for just 3 months was very confident to undergo the surgery. Within 3 days, she had undergone laproscopic myomectomy and is recovering very fast. She is very happy with the whole procedure and will be planning for the family soon. We are very fortunate to meet such a good, friendly, patient and experienced doctor. Thank you very much Doctor.

review: You have to carry cash amount for treatment or consultation because they charge extra amount if you are using debit or credit cards for payment. Tests are little bit expensive than the others. Regarding doctor consultation was good.
